entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitehorse Airport 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 March 2023

Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 49 %

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 March 2023
